actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to eliminate a restriction on use of certain lands patented to the city of Hobart, Kiowa County, Oklahoma.

summary.text: Removes the reservation for school purposes from a lot patented by the United States to Hobart, Oklahoma, when Hobart deeds a specified lot of comparable size and value to its Board of Education.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate a restriction on use of certain lands patented to the city of Hobart, Kiowa County, Oklahoma.
